application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required by Condition 4 (submission of details - t) Schedule of works, methodology, experts engaged and discreet test patches for the proposed cleaning of brickwork, removal of stain, tuck pointing) of Listed Building consent LB/20/00865 (Redevelopment of property involving the demolition of lower ground and ground rear extension; replacement of lower ground floor slab to rear; construction of mansard roof, basement extension under rear garage and provision of roof terrace to rear garage; construction of lower ground and ground rear extension and new closet wing from lower ground to first floors; and associated internal refurbishment works throughout)
